ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.user

Class FriendsList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.user.FriendsList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filterable<Item>, Observable, java.lang.Iterable<User>

    public class FriendsList
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable, Filterable<Item>, java.lang.Iterable<User>
    Friendslist maintains a list of Users that that a User has, Remote data access is handled by the User which owns the friendslist. When a user receives an update from its friendslist, the data is written to the local index and the remote index.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FriendsList

        public FriendsList()
        Called by a User when the friendslist is requested. All updates to this friendslist are picked up via the observer pattern by the User that owns it, this is when changes are committed to persistent memory.
